title: Where Was Kamala Harris On January 6? And Why It Matters. (Ep 1704)
description:
In this episode I address the scandal surrounding the location of Kamala Harris on January 6th. 

News Picks:


A disturbing new report into a CIA spying program.


The FBI isn’t being candid about its role in the school board/parent scandal. 

Another Democrat lawmaker attacks parents and their role in education. 


Where was Kamala Harris on January 6th?
